title: Crime Alert 04.12.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.12.19
description:
20-year-old cold case solved by a job application. In Maine, 60-year-old driving school owner accused of sexually assaulting a minor. Good news out of Chicago, murders and shootings are down in the first months of 2019. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
